price: (Ey kafirlər!) Siz və Allahdan başqa tapındıqlarınız Cəhənnəm odunusunuz. Siz (mütləq) ora girəcəksiniz.
arabic: إِنَّكُمۡ وَمَا تَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ حَصَبُ جَهَنَّمَ أَنتُمۡ لَهَا وَٰرِدُونَ

version.title: Azerbaijani translation - Ali Khan Mosaiv
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Azerbaijani by Khan Mosaiv. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: innakum wamā taʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi ḥaṣabu jahannama antum lahā wāridūna
